name: Miss.Valentine(Mikita)
text: On Play: If your Leader has a type including "Baroque Works", look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a type including "Baroque Works" other than [Miss.Valentine(Mikita)] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.

effect.text: If your Leader has a type including "Baroque Works", look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a type including "Baroque Works" other than [Miss.Valentine(Mikita)] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.
